title: Shooting death of boy, 4, followed years of investigations
content:
Ryan Welch, 4, was killed at his home by a gun in his parents' master bathroom closet. The family had a history with CPS.
It's not clear who found the .40 caliber Smith & Wesson in the master bathroom closet or who pulled the trigger. It could have been 4-year-old Ryan Welch or his 6-year-old brother.
